metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15678 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: TightVNC code version 1.3.10 contains heap buffer overflow inrfbServerCutText handler, which can potentially result code execution..This attack appear to be exploitable via network connectivity.

criterions.comment: x11vnc package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
vncsnapshot package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
vlc package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
directvnc package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
